item.title: Andrew W. Swift
item.description: About Me Andrew is an Associate Professor in the department of Mathematical and Data Sciences at the University of Nebraska at Omaha, having joined the department in 2006.

item.title: Becky Brusky
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Becky joined the Data and Decision Sciences Lab and the department of Mathematics at the University of Nebraska at Omaha as an Instructor in 2019.

item.title: Betty N. Love
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Betty is a Professor in the Mathematical and Data Sciences Department at the University of Nebraska at Omaha.

item.title: Cong Wang
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Cong Wang received a M.S. and Ph.

item.title: Fabio Torres Vitor
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Fabio joined the Data and Decision Sciences Lab and the department of Mathematics at the University of Nebraska at Omaha as an Assistant Professor in 2019.

item.title: Mahbubul Majumder
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Mahbubul is an Associate Professor of Statistics with an interest in the emerging field of data science.

item.title: Steve From
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Steven joined the department of Mathematics at the University of Nebraska at Omaha in 1986 as an Assistant Professor.

item.title: Xiaoyue Cheng
item.description: Academic and Professional Experience Xiaoyue Cheng is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Mathematics at the University of Nebraska at Omaha.
